Trade/Device Name(s): U-RIGHT TD-4280 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
U-RIGHT TD-4280 Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for U-RIGHT TD-4280 Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood using an electrochemical biosensor
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes mellitus or use on neonates
